definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to walk (side part of split character)
restitution/return of something to its original owner/remittance
to restore to the original state/to reconstruct (an event)/reduction (chemistry)
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
to pay back in full/to redeem a debt

sentences.english: In the latter period, they were armed with Winchester rifles, clubs and knives.
sentences.chinese: 在後階段，她們還配備了連發槍以及軍棍和軍刀。

sentences.english: No buts. You tin melodrama extinction afterward.
sentences.chinese: 別說可是，還輪不到你絕種呢。

sentences.english: We also do import and export business in chemicals and agricultural products.
sentences.chinese: 我公司還經營化學產品和家產品進出口的業務。

sentences.english: Eco-fashion has certainly proved that it has enough caché in the fashion world.
sentences.chinese: 生態時裝還證明它在時尚界有着足夠的影響力。

sentences.english: This is my first stand-alone blog , and it's still under construction.
sentences.chinese: 這是我的第一個獨立博客，還在建設中。

sentences.english: Also eat some fruits, milk and a small amount of soft drinks containing carbonic acid gas.
sentences.chinese: 還可喫一些水果，牛奶以及少量含碳酸氣的飲料。

sentences.english: Some day his pictures will be worth more than all you have in your shop.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，他的畫會比你店裏所有的一切還值錢。

sentences.english: There are new spin-off products aimed at older girls and women, such as sun screen and cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 該集團還推出了太陽鏡和化妝品等新的副產品。

sentences.english: They also can be able to re-edit the post even after posting it.
sentences.chinese: 他們還可以能夠重新編輯，即使它張貼的職位。

sentences.english: In the beginning the quarries lay far beyond the city limits.
sentences.chinese: 起初採石場還遠離城市的邊界。

sentences.english: As you can see, there are some consequences with the current arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 正如您所看到的，當前這種安排還存有許多問題。

sentences.english: We don't have any information from inside the plant.
sentences.chinese: 我們還沒有任何來自核電站裏面的消息，這是個問題。

sentences.english: Men also receive health education and testing that could save their life.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏男士還接受一些可以救命的健康教育和檢查。

sentences.english: Locals also lit Kongming lanterns, and sent them into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 當地人還點亮孔明燈，把它們放飛到天空中。

sentences.english: Not only can walking fish live out of water but they can also travel short distances over land.
sentences.chinese: 鮎魚不僅可以離開水存活，還可以在岸上短間隔移動。

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
